snippet.title: Keep your brolly handy - heavy rain on the way
snippet.content: MAKE sure you've got your brolly handy - a storm is heading to Adelaide just in time for school pickup. The Bureau of Meteorology says heavy falls have been experienced across the Far West Coast and Eyre Peninsula, with the front now passing over the Mid North to Adelaide. The downpour should hit Adelaide about 3.30pm. MORE TO COME
